name: Murlidhar kankhar
description: Behaved very well and explained very well we were short of money but they helped us a lot and reduced the money and also gave us a discount on medicine. Not only this but ma'am told us that as long as you are here I will advise you whenever you need any advice you can call me without hesitation thank you very much we will never forget your help and one thing ma'am your sweet smile is half a cure happens Thanks again🙏🙏

name: Verified Patient
